title: The Chaos Game
description: Javascript implementation of a game designed by Voolich and Devaney.

title: Light Switch Problem
description: Two visualizations (triangle and square) of the light switch problem. It is possible to save a GIF of the animation by clicking once with your mouse.
alt: screenshot of the Light Switch Problem.

title: Digits of $\pi$
description: A visual representation of the digits of $\pi$ using an iterated function system with $10$ functions. It is another way to show (visually) that its digits are actually random.
alt: screenshot of a representation of the digits of pi.

title: WFC with Wang tiles
description: Animation of an aperiodic tiling with 11 Wang Tiles using the Wave function collapse. It is a contribution to [Challenge \#171](https://thecodingtrain.com/challenges/171-wave-function-collapse) from The Coding Train, YouTube channel.
alt: screenshot of the animation of the aperiodic tiling with 11 Wang Tiles using the Wave Function Collapse.

title: Barnsley and Thurston set
description: Interactive tool to visualize the space of 2-generator semigroup of dilations of the plane.

title: McMullen Maps
description: Interactive tool to visualize the parameter space and the Julia sets of singular perturbation of $z^n$.
